articles.description:
RT shann.lens 🇦🇷ETHLatam🇦🇷
Coming to Bogotá 🇨🇴 and want to continue the 
@ethlatam convo on Web3 Social 🌿🪩❤️✨? 
A special squad (@WaverlyMaven @0xChristina @parisrouz @provenauthority and more) has put together a proposal for a Community Hub @EFDevcon and we'd love ur love!👇 https://forum.devcon.org/t/community-hub-proposal-web3-social/938

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Emily 🔜 DappCon | EthBerlin
Officially joined @developer_dao 🥰
I think I need PTO so I can read the bajillion of messages in the Discord 😂
These guys are ACTIVE and I. AM. HYPED.
So many aspiring devrel folks too 🥹
I'm stoked that ppl realize how this role is critical to dev success (+web3 in general)
articles.title: RT Emily 🔜 DappCon | EthBerlin: Officially joined @developer_dao 🥰 I think I need PTO so I can read the bajillion of messages in the Discord �...

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Orbis, the web3 social protocol
So much to build. How do we find the right builders?
@aleksiloytynoja has the answers! He's the founder of @kleoverse, a proof-of-talent platform with a community of over 16,000 DAO contributors. 
AMA thread now open for your questions https://orbis.club/post/kjzl6cwe1jw1479xv1ykqsuk1ld9gzwyy35oas7chv9tdm3uln4qbca815qaqc0

articles.description:
RT shann.lens 🇦🇷ETHLatam🇦🇷
Join me @Livepeer @EmbassyDAO TONIGHT to close out #EthLatam with demos and pitches from the next generation of web3 builders 🇦🇷💫🚀 Register ⬇️
EmbassyDAO.eth: JUST IN: The last @ethlatam side event will be happening at @EmbassyDAO Node 1 🎉
⏱️ When? Sunday August 14, 2022 - 18hs
📍Where? 11 de Septiembre 858, CABA
We'll learn about what the Web3 community in 🇦🇷 is building while sharing great wine 🍷& beer 🍻
 https://www.eventbrite.com/e/embassydao-demo-day-ethlatam-side-event-tickets-400969038187

@dabit3  and @developer_dao for this.
